titleStmt.title: Prison thoughts written by Tho. Browning, citiyen [sic] and cook of London, who hath been a prisoner in Ludgate ever since the twelveth day of August, 1680.
titleStmt.author: Browning, Tho. (Thomas)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by the author in Ludgate (who is still a prisoner there),

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Ludgate (who is still a prisoner there
